task.summary: - welcome.class.php: Change Session Test - cache.class.php: Add Template Cache - curl.class.php: Add UserAgent and Cookie Support - template.class.php: Add Template Cache and Dynamic Header and Footer function - update.class.php - Change Template Build - Add version.class.php - Fix dynamic load Page directory - Fix dynamic load Dynamic Directory
0.3.1 / 12.04.2015 ================== * Fix Template cache class * Fix welcome Session access * Add curl Download methode * Add Version Sha and Repo URL * Add Update Step 3 and 4
0.3.2 / 12.04.2015 ================== * Add Update step5 * Change Repo * Change step4 control exists master.zip
0.3.3 / 12.04.2015 ================== * Add PCLZip for Update * Add rename Directory * Add copy Directory * Change update class
0.3.5 / 13.04.2015 ================== * Add version update * Add show current version

0.4.0 / 13.04.2015 ================== * Add multiple database support * Add pdo charset support * Add pdo driver support: MySQL, CUBRID, MS SQL Server, Firebird, Informix, ODBC, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQLite 2);
0.4.1 / 13.04.2015 ================== * Add phpdocumentor * Add "autoload.class.php" documentation and example * Remove phpunit directory

0.4.2 / 13.04.2015 ================== * Add all package Class Documentation * Remove cURL Class "downloadUrl" method * Change database class "result_array" method. allowed select commands * Change move template class "truncate" method to text class
0.4.5 / 15.04.2015 ================== * Add init libs directory * Remove simple array define in ftp class * Change include pclzip * Change session include * Fix Template cache
0.4.6 / 27.04.2015 ================== * Fix PDO Options * Fix Session and Cookie isset
0.4.7 / 27.04.2015 ================== * Add Browser Class * Fix Unix get locale
0.4.8 / 28.04.2015 ================== * Add FTP get function * Change security get ip address

0.4.9 / 13.05.2015 ================== * Add FTP setPassivMode * Add .htacces Performance * Fix FTP Connections in all functions * Fix language loadLang functions * Fix template createValidURL functions
0.4.10 / 28.09.2015 ================== * Fix start session by memcache * Fix get filteype * Fix function truncate to static function
0.5.0 / 28.09.2015 ================== * Add XML Class * Add Validater Class * Change Security Class with Validater Class * Change loadFunctions -> initClasses * Fix init initialize folders

0.6.0 / 08.10.2015 ================== * Performance fix at all files * Fix curl get data post fields * Add createException method in error class * Change FTP class, more controls in system functions * Fix number getDiffValue function get seconds * Change template class, mor controls in system functions * Fix zip class readFiles function

0.7.0 / 12.12.2015 ================== * PHP 7 Supported * Remove deprecated pclzip.lib.php * Renamed error.class.php to errors.class.php (PHP 7) * Add Class mod_rewrite for valid urls * Change zip.class.php content to ZipArchive PHP Class * Minor bugfixes
0.7.2 / 12.12.2015 ================== * Remove session class * Add mod_rewrite getUrlSimple function * Change security class filter_input to filter_var
0.7.3 / 12.12.2015 ================== * Remove session_start() function * Add loadSessionHandler, safe session handler, needs a database, can in constants.php deactivated
- Change System Folder - Add Code Folder - Add Date class - Add FileSystem class - constant OS change Linux to Unix - init session_start change
v2.0 Alpha - add last unit tests - add images class
